dict.acceptation: 有规律的；规则，整齐的；不变的；合格的；
正规军；主力（或正式）队员；常客；

sent.orig: A novel method to construct regular or near-regular Low-density parity-check codes from prime fields is proposed.
sent.trans: 提出在素域上构造正则及近正则低密度校验码的一种新方法。

sent.orig: Be able to provide regular reports in an agreed format on a regular basis.
sent.trans: 定期按照规定的格式上交报告。

sent.orig: Regular mealtimes, not just regular sleep times, help regulate our circadian rhythms.
sent.trans: 不仅是有规律的睡眠时间，有规律的饮食时间也对调节我们的生理节奏有帮助。

sent.orig: Regular Season Sets-The jerseys worn during the NBA regular season.
sent.trans: 常规赛球员穿着的球衣套装。

sent.orig: Lab test and metrology: regular lab test regular calibration of checking tool and gauge.
sent.trans: 产品试验和计量：产品定期试验检具和量具的定期检定。
